bind.jr:requiredMsg: Its required for Cibo Labs biomass library

bind.relevant: /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='wet_sample_q' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='animal_dry_sample' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='library_wet_sample' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='wet_sample' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='dry_sample' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='platemeter_calibration' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='woody_wet_sample' or /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type ='woody_dry_sample'

bind.calculate: if( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type = 'platemeter_sample', sum( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/pasture_quadrat/platemeter_height_cm ) div ( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/count_quadrat ), if( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/transect_sample_type = 'platemeter_calibration', sum( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/pasture_quadrat/platemeter_height_cm ) div ( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/count_quadrat ), sum( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/pasture_quadrat/pasture_height_cm ) div ( /Cibo___Pasture_Biomass_Collector/transect_information/count_quadrat )))

input.label: Cibo Labs - Pasture Biomass Collector
input.hint:
The Cibo-Biomass Collector App is a simple mobile data collection app for undertaking rapid pasture assessments in the paddock. It works in combination with our Biomass Library app - CLICK HERE

The Transect location will be set to the middle qudrat, with all the data ready to be used for direct input to forage budgets, or for calibration of satellite imagery.

Our User Guide for the Pasture Biomass Collector and Library survey123 forms is available - CLICK HERE

input.label: Email Address
input.hint: By entering your email address you are agreeing to the CiboLabs Privacy Policy - CLICK HERE

input.label: Transect Id
input.hint: automated based on current time and Property Name

select1.label: Valid Record
select1.hint: Select 'No - Testing' if your practicing of testing the system

input.label: PLEASE SUPPLY YOUR PLATEMETER EQUATION
input.hint: Leave as default or enter formula details below (as 'kgDM/Ha = A + B x Height'), for example: A = 500 B = 140

input.label: Equation Part - A
input.hint: used for adding as 'A'

input.label: Equation Part - B
input.hint: used as the multiplier 'B' with platemeter height

upload.label: Transect Image
upload.hint: Take photo looking along intended direction of Transect

input.label: NUMBER OF QUADRATS REQUIRED (MIN = 5 to MAX = 12)
DO 10 PLONKS THEN ENTER THE AVERAGE READINGS FROM PLATEMETER (MIN 5 READINGS)
input.hint: <font color="blue">TRANSECT LENTGH (MIN = 10m to MAX = 50m)</font>

input.label: COLLECT 3 SAMPLES TO REPRESENT THE PASTURE BIOMASS

select1.label: Quadrat Sample Type
select1.hint: Is this sample representing a low, mod or high total standing dry matter (TSDM) for this pasture species

input.label: Sample Identifier
input.hint: Please provide the sample bag label

upload.label: Pasture Image
upload.hint: Optional - photo looking down (at elbow height) for paddock surface

upload.label: Pasture Image at 45 degrees
upload.hint: Optional - photo looking down at 45 degrees for quadrat image

input.label: Sample Wet Weight (grams)
input.hint: Measured weight (tared using scales) of cut pasture sample

input.label: Platemeter Height (cm)
input.hint: As read from Patemeter at location, optional with 'Wet Weight' sampling

range.label: Field Estimate Dry Matter (%)
range.hint: Estimate dry matter % as observed in the field

input.label: Sample Dry Weight (grams)
input.hint: Tare weight of dried cut pasture sample

input.label: Field Estimate TSDM (kg/Ha)
input.hint: Total Standing Dry Matter as kg/Ha estimate for location

input.label: Estimate Pasture Height (cm)
input.hint: Optional - estimate based on ruler at location

input.label: Field Estimate Stock Days (as DSE/Ha)
input.hint: Optional - Quadrat Estimate for Grazing Days (ie: Stock, LSU etc) with LSU = 8 DSE

select1.label: Dominant Species
select1.hint: Please use the common name of species. If ground use 'Bare' and if not listed use 'Other'

input.label: Dominant Species - Other
input.hint: other species not listed above- free text

select1.label: Co-dominant Species
select1.hint: Please use the common name of species

input.label: Sub-dominant Species
input.hint: Please use the common name of species

input.label: Quadrat Lab Dry Matter (%)
input.hint: From drying (lab, oven or microwave) process

input.label: Quadrat Calculated TSDM (kg/Ha)
input.hint: Quadrat TSDM calculated based on wet weights (view only)

input.label: WALK TO THE NEXT LOCATION BEFORE CLICKING '+' BUTTON
input.hint: Walk to next location BEFORE clicking the '+' button, as this will record the next GPS location coordinates

input.label: Field Estimate TSDM Variance
input.hint: Field TSDM variance from Transect Mean

input.label: Quadrat Lab TSDM Variance
input.hint: Quadrat TSDM variance from Lab TSDM Average

input.label: Mature Trees Count
input.hint: Count all trees using dendrometer sight method (360 degree radius)

input.label: Regrowth Count
input.hint: Count all regrowth (1m either side of transect)

input.label: Regrowth Basal Diameter (mm)
input.hint: Estimate average basal diameter at 30cm above ground (1m either side of transect)

input.label: Shrubs Count
input.hint: Count all shrubs >1m tall (1m either side of transect)

input.label: Shrubs Basal Diameter (mm)
input.hint: Estimate average basal diameter at 30cm above ground for all shrubs >1m tall (1m either side of transect)

input.label: Estimate Canopy Height (m)
input.hint: Average tree canopy height in whole meters

input.label: Sum of Quadrat (kg/Ha)
input.hint: View Only

input.label: Average TSDM (kg/Ha) for Transect
input.hint: Average calculated based on transect point data (view only)

input.label: Transect Estimate Stock Days (as DSE/Ha)
input.hint: Optional - Transect Estimate for Grazing Days (ie: Stock, LSU etc) with LSU = 8 DSE

input.label: Average Pasture Height (cm)
input.hint: Pasture Height (Average of Transect)

input.label: Transect Wet Weights Average (kg/Ha)
input.hint: Average calculated based on quadrant data (view only)

input.label: Lab Dry Matter (%) for Transect
input.hint: From drying (lab, oven or microwave) process

input.label: Transect Calculated Average TSDM (kg/Ha)
input.hint: Transect average calculated based on quadrant wet weights (view only)

input.label: Calculated Average TSDM Variance
input.hint: Transect lab Average TSDM calculated variance

input.label: Calculated Average TSDM Deviation
input.hint: Transect lab Average TSDM calculated Standard Deviation

select1.label: Dominant Species
select1.hint: Please use the common name of species. If ground use 'Bare' and if not listed use 'Other'

input.label: Dominant Species - Other
input.hint: other species not listed above- free text

select1.label: Co-dominant Species
select1.hint: Please use the common name of species

input.label: Sub-dominant Species
input.hint: Free text for multiple pasture names (seperate with comma)

range.label: Unpalatable Species (%)
range.hint: Percentage of Total DM that is Unpalatable Species (Average of Site)

range.label: Unpalatable 3P Species (%)
range.hint: Percentage of Total DM that is old, rank 3P biomass (Average of site)

range.label: Average Dry Matter (%) for Transect
range.hint: As estimated from previous drying process (Hay should be >85%DM, All Green ~20-30%DM)

select1.label: Land Condition (ABCD)
select1.hint: Please provide a Condition class (ABCD) for the landscape

select1.label: Soil Condition (ABCD)
select1.hint: Please provide a Condition class (ABCD) for surrounding soils

select1.label: Plant Condition (ABCD)
select1.hint: Please provide a Condition class (ABCD) for the surrounding plants

input.label: CLICK THE TICK (BOTTOM RIGHT OF FORM) TO SUBMIT RECORDS
input.hint: Click the 'TICK' located bottom right of form to submit the records

input.label: Transect Average TSDM Variance
input.hint: Transect Field Average TSDM calculated variance

input.label: Transect Average TSDM Deviation
input.hint: Transect Field Average TSDM calculated Standard Deviation

input.label: Transect Start (as mid-point)
input.hint: automatically calculated based on quadrant locations
